ac: 25, touch 16, flat-footed 20 (+5 armor, +1 deflection, +4 Dex, +1 dodge, +4 natural)
other_gear: +2 studded leather, +1 kukris (2), masterwork composite longbow (+4 Str) with 20 arrows, amulet  of natural armor +1, belt of giant strength +2, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, 793 gp

spells.ranger spells prepared:
(CL 9th; concentration +10)

2nd-barkskin, cat's grace, wind wall

1st-delay poison, longstrider, resist energy

feats: Deadly Aim, Dodge, Double Slice, Endurance, Improved Grapple, Improved Initiative, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Improved Unarmed Strike, Point-Blank Shot, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Focus (kukri)

sections.body:
Before Combat The ranger casts barkskin, cat's grace, delay poison, longstrider, and resist energy (fire).

During Combat The ranger attacks with his bow using Deadly Aim. In melee, he uses his kukris or attempts to grapple.

Base Statistics Without barkskin, cat's grace, delay poison, longstrider, and resist energy, the ranger's statistics are

Init +6

Senses normal

AC 20, touch 14, flat-footed 17

Ref +11

Immune none

Resist none

Speed 30 ft.

Ranged mwk longbow +15/+10/+5 (1d8+4/×3)

Dex 14

CMD 30 (32 vs. grapple)

Skills Acrobatics +12, Stealth +17.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A bounty hunter brings back his targets dead or alive.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Ranger/Rangers/Bounty Hunter/Alec Renatus

sections.body: Alec hunts people to bring them to justice, not because he enjoys killing. He uses deadly force only if he must to protect himself or others. He tries to learn as much as possible about his target before starting his pursuit, and selects potions and other items based on the best tactics for capturing that person.
Alec generally does work only for legitimate and lawful governments, but might attempt to capture a PC if he was deceived into believing that PC has broken the law.
Alec could approach the PCs to gain their help in capturing a particularly difficult target.

sections.name: Alec Renatus

special_qualities: camouflage, favored terrain (plains +2, urban +4), hunter's bond (companions), quarry, swift tracker, track +6, wild empathy +12, woodland stride
name: Bounty Hunter
skills: Acrobatics +14 (+18 when jumping), Bluff +10, Climb +12, Disguise +7, Knowledge (geography, nature) +8, Knowledge (local) +5, Linguistics +2, Perception +16, Sense Motive +11, Stealth +19, Survival +16, Swim +10
combat_gear: potions of cure serious wounds (2), smokesticks (2), tanglefoot bags (2)
